name: Sword Fighter (aadianidx)
description:
This is a game written for the MiniJameGam#11 Game Jam. It is written in Python 3.10 with Pygame 2.12. The game can be downloaded from its GitHub repository https://github.com/yadavalu/MiniJameGam11. If you want to download the files, put the mp3 files in a folder called sfx and the png files in a folder called gfx. It is recommeneded to clone the main branch on GitHub.

The objective of this game is for the Delivery Hero (yellow character) to collect the swords and boxes and deliver it to the Reciever (blue character) without getting killed by the Enemies (red characters). Use up, down, left, right to move the hero and use space to grab tools.
